game.name: Planets and Pancakes
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Professor Pancake, the only creator of Pancakes, has been kidnapped by alien thugs and trapped across dangerous dimensions. Gather a crew of up to 5 Astronauts, survive terrifying Aliens, and rescue him before the universe loses its Pancakes forever!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Professor Pancake, the only creator of Pancakes, has been kidnapped by alien thugs and trapped across dangerous dimensions. Gather a crew of up to 5 Astronauts, survive terrifying Aliens, and rescue him before the universe loses its Pancakes forever!
